categories: Category:Star Wars: The High Republic (comic series)

nodes.text: Star Wars: The High Republic 1 Behind-the-Scenes Exclusive

Star Wars: The High Republic 1 Behind-the-Scenes Exclusive is a free promotional comic book that presents the unfinalized script and artwork from issue 1 of Star Wars: The High Republic. It features an annotated script written by Cavan Scott, art by Ario Anindito, and a gallery of the issue's variant edition covers. It was published digitally by Marvel Comics on April 7, 2021.

See behind-the-scenes of Star Wars: The High Republic #1 Digital Comic with action-packed extras including the script, variant cover gallery, and the penciled pages before they were inked and colored!
